title: Riot I need 3 RP
body: Riot I need only 3 more RP to buy a Hextech Key. Now I have 122 RP but the Hextech Key is 125, so can I have 3 RP please?

replies.body:
These types of requests need to be handled in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our specialists can assist you directly.

Let me know if you have any questions!
